rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read. If you wish to write to the Prime Minister, you can find contact details here: http://www.number10.gov.uk/footer/contact-us
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
